label: Text
name: text
description: The reading text you want to display.

important.description:
• Clickable chunk of text must be in between asterisks (*).
  • Add timestamps after the asterisks to indicate the start time and end time of the audio for the chunk of text in this format {startTimeInSecond:endTimeInSecond}.
  • Clickable chunk of text without timestamp markers will play the whole audio from start to finish.
important.example:
*{0:5}Once upon a time, there lived a man and his pet fish.*
In this example, when the sentence is clicked, the audio will play from the beginning and stop at the 5th second.

name: enablePlay
label: Show play button
description: Add a play button to read the whole text automatically.

label: Cover image
name: image
description: Cover image to be displayed on top of the text. Without this, only text will be displayed.
